TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConnectorAccessibleObject extends System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 提供活動設計工具之間接點的相關資訊，協助工具應用程式會使用這些資訊為殘障使用者調整應用程式的 UI。

span.span: Provides information on connectors between activity designers that accessibility applications use to adjust an application's UI for users with impairments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 在使用自由格式配置時，活動設計工具會使用 類別互相連接。When using a freeform layout, activity designers are connected to each other using the class. 類別可用來提供活動設計工具之間這些接點的相關資訊，協助工具應用程式會使用這些資訊調整應用程式的 UI。The class is used to provide information on these connectors between activity designers that accessibility applications use to adjust an application's UI. 此外，當從 衍生類別時，您可以使用這個類別來自訂繪製。Also, you can use this class to customize the drawing when you derive a class from .

summary.span: 取得這個可存取之物件的角色。

span.span: Gets the role of this accessible object.
One of the values of AccessibleRole.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `AccessibleRole` 屬性會描述物件是何種使用者介面項目。The `AccessibleRole` property describes what kind of user interface element an object is. 如果無法判斷控制項的角色，`AccessibleRole` 屬性會設定為 `Default`。If the control's role cannot be determined, the `AccessibleRole` property is set to `Default`.
